exams.title: Manage Exams
exams.noExamsDesc: Start by adding your upcoming exams to create a study plan
exams.updateExam: Update the details of your exam

studyPlan.title: Study Plan
studyPlan.noPlanDesc: Click the button above to generate your personalized study plan
studyPlan.selectDay: Select a day to move to
studyPlan.optimization: There are {count} available days with no study tasks assigned. Consider regenerating the plan to optimize your schedule.

timer.title: Focus Timer
timer.noSessions: No study sessions recorded yet. Use the timer to track your study time!

settings.title: Settings
settings.configDesc: Configure your study preferences and application behavior
settings.reviewDaysDesc: Days dedicated to review before exam
settings.darkModeDesc: Switch between light and dark theme
settings.notificationsDesc: Allow notifications for timer and reminders
settings.dataDesc: Manage your application data and reset options
settings.storageDetails:
• Exams and study data are saved in your browser's local storage
• Data will persist between sessions until you clear it
• Data is not synced between devices
settings.resetWarning: Resetting will permanently erase all your data, including exams, study plans, and settings.
